select * from youtuber order by subscriber desc
select * from "trend" where yno = #{yno} order by recordDate asc
select count(vno) videoCount from video WHERE yno = #{yno} and date(regDate) >= SUBDATE(NOW(), INTERVAL #{term} MONTH)

select count(*) videoCount from video where yno=#{yno} and regDate between date_sub(DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(now())-1) * -1 DAY), INTERVAL #{num} week) and DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL (DAYOFWEEK(now())-1) * -1 DAY) group by date_format(regDate, '%y-%u') order by date_format(regDate, '%y-%u') asc;
